title: Party Boy in Room 211
description: Volume #2 The Sterling brothers have marked LA with their sin. Dax finds himself fighting old demons. He lost count of the number of women he has entertained in LA, but then he sees the redhead who has been haunting his dreams for weeks.  When he happens to run into her again, he refuses to take no for an answer. Six weeks promised, and so many possibilities lying ahead of him. But can Dax keep out of trouble—and jail—long enough to enjoy it?  Vol. 1- approx. 26K words (Available Now) Vol. #2 - approx. 26K Vol. #3 April 18th Vol. #4 April 25th  -This is a four-part erotic serial.- Not suitable for readers under 18.
author: H.J. Bellus
